exceptions.tactic: intros U T D f g Hfg Hcf x Dx.
intros U' T D f g Hfg Hcf x Dx.

ctx: intros U' T' D f g Hfg Hcf x Dx.
intros U' T' D f g Hfg Hcf x Dx.
exceptions.exn: In environment T, U : UniformSpace U' : T -> Prop T', D : T -> U f : forall x : T, U' x -> T' x = D x g : continuous_on U' T' Hfg : T Hcf : U' Hfg x : U -> Prop Dx : locally (D Hfg) x The term "Hcf" has type "U' Hfg" while it is expected to have type "U -> Prop".

ctx: intros U' T' D f g Hfg Hcf x Dx.
intros U' T' D f g Hfg Hcf x Dx.
exceptions.exn: In environment T, U : UniformSpace H : forall (D : T -> Prop) (f : T -> U) (x : T), locally x D -> continuous_on D f -> continuous f x U' : T -> Prop T', D : T -> U f : forall x : T, U' x -> T' x = D x g : continuous_on U' T' Hfg : T Hcf : U' Hfg x : U -> Prop x0 : posreal H0 : forall y : U, ball (D Hfg) x0 y -> x y Unable to unify "UniformSpace.sort T" with "filtermap D (within U' (locally Hfg)) x".

original: intros U T D f g Hfg Hcf x Dx. intros y Hy. apply (continuous_continuous_on _ _ _ _ _ Hcf). intros x' Dx'. apply Hfg; auto.
